channel.title: Art feed
channel.description: This is a longer description about your blog.

item.title: Friend's Homestead
item.description:
Two small scenes from a friend’s porch in mass this weekend. The star of the show here, apparently, are house plants. One seemingly leafless and stick-y, another with exaggerated leaves, clearly an out-of-towner.

The family was out for a few hours and I was home with the dogs, so for this one I actually sat and drew what I saw, as opposed to drawing from a photo.
item.dc:creator: Wes Carr

item.title: The barns across the street
item.description:
Pen and inkwash drawing of a scene from our front door.

Our house is placed super close to the road, as is the set of mostly unused barns across the street. They just reroofed the tilted one so it might have more hope than it seems.

I’m getting into a groove of creating these type of sketches. A new page layout is on the way…
item.dc:creator: Wes Carr
